name: BinaryNow
tag_list: software, windows, kingsoft, software602, print2pdf, kingsoft-office, wps, kso, kis, kingsoft-internet-security, downloaod, shareware, freeware
overview: Founded in 2009, BinaryNow is a multi-vendor online software distributor that contains essential software tools for everyday use. All software available on our website has been tested by our product certification team and is guaranteed to be free of any viruses or spyware. Get the best value on the market and obtain the software solution you need, instantly.

milestones.description:
BinaryNow Releases Kingsoft Office 2010: An Affordable Alternative to Microsoft Office
BinaryNow, Inc. released a new version of Kingsoft Office 2010.
milestones.source_description: BinaryNow Releases Kingsoft Office 2010: An Affordable Alternative to Microsoft Office

milestones.description:
BinaryNow Expands Product Portfolio with Wondershare DemoCreator 3.0

BinaryNow, Inc. has added to its expanding product portfolio Wondershare DemoCreator 3.0. This easy-to-use software is designed for screencasting, eTraining and eLearning development.
milestones.source_description: BinaryNow Expands Product Portfolio with Wondershare DemoCreator 3.0
